General.Name: Blockmate Ventures Inc
General.Description: Blockmate Ventures Inc. builds blockchain businesses worldwide. The company operates as a Web3 incubator/venture creator focusing on businesses that utilize blockchain technology and decentralization to provide utility, accessibility, and sustainability around everyday services. It incubates blockchain businesses by providing capital and people. The company was formerly known as Midpoint Holdings Limited and changed its name to Blockmate Ventures Inc. in May 2022. Blockmate Ventures Inc. is based in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

2.Name: Mr. Konstantin  Lichtenwald B.B.A., CPA, CGA
2.Title: CFO & Company Sec.
